Producer: Ketie Danelia, Brigitte Hofer, Cornelia Seitler
Synopsis: A village at the Georgian Black Sea with friendly people believing to know each other. One day, Eliko is found hanged; his granddaughter Moe comes to organize his funeral. She is confronted with a web of lies and the tragic consequences of Eliko's hidden love life with Amnon over the last 22 years. The truth provokes the villagers to take a stand.
Title: Wet Sand
